name: Spoki.lv - remove ads
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix(http://www.spoki.lv),

               url-prefix(http://spoki.lv),

               url-prefix(https://spoki.lv),

               url-prefix(https://www.spoki.lv)

{

div[id^="follow"], 
div[id^="okarte-banner"],
div[style^="margin: 5px 0 5px 0px;"],
div[id^="mod_eshops_b"],
div[style^="text-align:center;margin-bottom:3px;"],
div[style^="text-align:center;margin:5px 0 5px 0;"],
div[style^="width: 180px; margin: 5px 0 0 0px; position:relative; z-index:0"],
iframe[width^="250"],
object[classid^="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000"]
{ display:none !important; }

}
